title: The plurisie of sorrovv, let blood in the eye-veine: or, The Muses teares for the death of our late soueraigne, Iames King of England, &c. By Will. Hogson Mag: in Art: Cantab

publisher: Printed by Iohn Legatt, and are to be sold at the Grey-hound in Paules Church-yard,
